column1: #text=It is time for me to get my haircut .
#text=I call my hairdresser and make an appointment .
#text=She says she can see me today at 3:00 pm .
#text=I leave the house at 2:30 in order to get there in time .
#text=When I arrive I check in and sit down in the waiting area .
#text=She first takes me to the shampoo bowl to wash my hair .
#text=I sit down and she puts a plastic cape around my neck to protect my clothes .
#text=She leans the seat back and places my head over the shampoo bowl .
#text=She wets my hair and then lathers it with soap .
#text=Then she rinses the soap out and puts in conditioner .
#text=She rinses the conditioner out and then wraps a towel around my head .
#text=She leans my seat back up and dries my hair with the towel .
#text=She then leads me to her barber chair to sit .
#text=She combs my hair and begins cutting .
#text=She cuts the top , sides and back .
#text=I keep my head very still while she does this .
#text=After she is through cutting my hair she dries it with a blow-dryer .
#text=The she removes the plastic cape from around my neck and uses a soft brush to brush any look hair from my neck and face .
#text=Next we go to the cash register and I pay her for my haircut plus a tip .
